snippet: The move isconsidered a crucial step to coaxing the militant group into peace talks to end the 11-year-old war in Afghanistan.
abstract: Pakistan agrees to free more Taliban prisoners, move considered crucial to coaxing militant group into peace talks to end 11-year-old war in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The move isconsidered a crucial step to coaxing the militant group into peace talks to end the 11-year-old war in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Pakistan Agreed  to Free More Afghan Taliban Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Deal Reached to Free More Afghan Taliban Prisoners
